TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE and resides in the town of GPE , GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

DATE the applicant worked as a miner at the “ ORG ” mining factory No . CARDINAL - the State Open Stock Company . On DATE , following a medical examination , the applicant was recognised as an invalid due to an occupational disease . By an order of CARDINAL DATE by his employer , the applicant was awarded a lump sum of CARDINAL NORP hryvnyas ( ORG ) and DATE payments of MONEY . By another order of CARDINAL DATE , the DATE payments were increased to MONEY .
The awarded lump sum of CARDINAL ORG was never paid to the applicant and the DATE payments were recovered only in part .
In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in ORG of L’viv Region against his former employer to recover all the payments due to him .

On DATE , the court found in favour of the applicant ( ORG мiського суду ) . The mining company was ordered to pay the applicant CARDINAL ORG . The decision became effective and , on DATE , was sent for execution to the mining company and later transferred for enforcement to ORG ( вiддiл PERSON виконавчоï служби Червоноградського мiського управлiння юстицiï ) .
The part of the judgment on the DATE payment of arrears was fully executed in DATE and the related enforcement proceedings were closed on DATE .
The part of the judgment on the lump sum for the applicant ’s disability was fully executed in DATE , and the enforcement proceedings were closed on DATE .

Under LAW , in case of delay in the fulfilment of its financial obligations , the debtor must , upon a claim of the creditor , pay the amount of the debt , plus any interest payable at an established inflation rate during the default period .
CARDINAL . PERSON of GPE of DATE “ on Enforcement Proceedings ”

Under LAW , the enforcement of judgments is entrusted to ORG . Under LAW of the PERSON the creditor may file a complaint against actions or omissions of ORG with the head of the competent department of that ORG or with a local court . Article CARDINAL of the PERSON entitles the creditor to institute court proceedings against ORG for inadequate enforcement or non - enforcement of a judgement , and to receive compensation .
CARDINAL . PERSON of GPE of DATE “ on ORG ”

LAW provides for the liability of bailiffs for any inadequate performance of their duties , and compensation for damages caused by a bailiff when enforcing a judgment . Under LAW , acts and omissions of the bailiff can be challenged before a superior official or the courts .
